opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: McLachlan Trustee of the Mary Butschek Living Trust v. Simon, an Individual and Former Trustee of the Navellier Series Fund

opinion:
536 U.S. 982

McLACHLAN, TRUSTEE OF THE MARY BUTSCHEK LIVING TRUST, ET AL.
v.
SIMON, AN INDIVIDUAL AND FORMER TRUSTEE OF THE NAVELLIER SERIES FUND, ET AL.

No. 01-1615.

Supreme Court of the United States.

August 26, 2002.

1

Petitions for rehearing denied.
